title: The Unknown War DVD 1-5 (DVD-5 RIP)
description:
The Unknown War(Soviet version in English)

Given that I don't possess a TV, let alone a dedicated DVD-player, I decided to rip torrent http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8177408/The_Unknown_War(Soviet_version_in_English) as uploaded by 'ZhiKonNi' to the x264 format for my own use. Although rated as DVD-5 quality, this in fact seems to have been sourced from VHS tape. So although the ripped content is less than a quarter the size of the original (the entire series now fitting snugly on a single DVD!), I think the degradation in video quality is hardly noticeable.

This rip includes both the Russian & English soundtracks, as well as the English subtitles. I have even included the 2 DVD-menu soundtracks (which I think are excellent) for completeness.

If you value this excellent series then
